title: The Cricket on the hearth
brief_description: Based on the novel by Charles Dickins this is a tale of love and misfortune with an American slant. Cast includes Owen Moore, Linda Arvidson, David Miles, Violet Mersereau, Dorothy West, mack Sennett, Harry Solter. Silent film with English intertitles.
